concept.title: Prose.io
concept.shortdesc: This is an explanation of what Prose.io is

conbody.p: Prose.io is a content editor for Github. Github authorizes Prose.io to connect your Github account to it. This allows you to create and commit a file directly from Prose.io to a repository on Github.
Prose.io is essentially a text/markdown editor specficially used for Github. You cannot use Prose.io without a Github account.
